title: Trimming Leading and Trailing Spaces from a String
description:
TRIME function removes spaces at the beginning and the end of STR.
Spaces within the string are ignored, even if they occur repeatedly.
name: TRIME

input.name: str
input.description: The input string that needs to be trimmed.

return_value.description: The trimmed version of the input string, with leading and trailing spaces removed.
